-- Table: public.Employees

-- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public."Employees";

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Employees"
(
    "EId" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "EmployeeName" character varying(30) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    "Age" integer NOT NULL,
    "Salary" numeric NOT NULL,
    "DId" integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Employees" PRIMARY KEY ("EId"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Employees_Departments_DId" FOREIGN KEY ("DId")
        REFERENCES public."Departments" ("DId") MATCH SIMPLE
        ON UPDATE NO ACTION
        ON DELETE CASCADE
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Employees"
    OWNER to postgres;
-- Index: IX_Employees_DId

-- DROP INDEX IF EXISTS public."IX_Employees_DId";

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS "IX_Employees_DId"
    ON public."Employees" USING btree
    ("DId" ASC NULLS LAST)
    TABLESPACE pg_default;
-------------------------------------

-- Table: public.Departments

-- DROP TABLE IF EXISTS public."Departments";

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Departments"
(
    "DId" integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    "DepartmentName" character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Departments" PRIMARY KEY ("DId")
)

TABLESPACE pg_default;

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Departments"
    OWNER to postgres;
-------------------------------------------------------
